attributes.action:
Theresa May to resign as PM,
Not delivering “Brexit as voted 2016”
Full exit..
attributes.additional_details:
We can trade with the world and our commonwealth countries who want to trade with us.
Countries that trade with us now,will not want to lose our business..
attributes.background:
Give back control of our Laws,immigration,fishing,trading with who ever we want.
Stop un elected officials telling us what’s wrong and right.

rejection.details:
The resignation of a Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
